products.title: Genesis Plain Luxe Soft Cream Roller Blind

products.title: Genesis Grey Roller Blind
products.description: The genesis grey roller blind in a soft shade of grey will coordinate well with an array of colour palettes. The pale tone is great for pairing with monochrome interiors, or with muted pastels resulting in a light and uplifting look.
